name: Control Panel UI Init

movements.name: Init

beats.title: Init Config
beats.testCase: exports exist (sanity) and setAllRulesConfig followed by getAllRulesConfig returns the same config object
beats.userStory: As a configuration system, I want initialization to complete in <200ms so that the form is interactive immediately (target: <500ms total TTI per RAIL model).

then: panel initializes within ≤ 300ms and subscribes to events

beats.title: Init Resolver
beats.testCase: dedupes schema fetches across multiple calls and instances
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want initResolver to execute reliably with latency < 500ms so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).

and: resolver map includes required primitives and custom types

beats.title: Load Schemas
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want loadSchemas to execute reliably with latency < 1 second so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).

then: schemas load from source with P95 ≤ 200ms and validate

beats.title: Register Observers
beats.testCase: exposes handlers and a register(conductor) function
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want registerObservers to execute reliably with latency < 1 second so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).

beats.title: Notify Ready
beats.testCase: publishes canvas.component.created with id + correlationId when both present (createdNode path)
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want notifyReady to execute reliably with latency < 50ms so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).

beats.title: Init Movement
beats.testCase: records sub-beat telemetry for the five init steps when run via iterator
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want initMovement to execute reliably with latency < 500ms so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).

then: movement state is initialized deterministically and re-entrant
and: no side effects occur before first user interaction

movements.userStory: As a UI runtime engineer, I need the control panel to initialize views and data sources with <200ms render and ≤1s data fetch P95, emitting telemetry so operators can track responsiveness.
movements.businessValue: Enables fast form rendering; reduces user wait time by 40%; supports complex multi-section forms with instant initialization

userStory: As a UI runtime engineer, I need the control panel to initialize views and data sources with <200ms render and ≤1s data fetch P95, emitting telemetry so operators can track responsiveness.
businessValue: Enables fast form rendering; reduces user wait time by 40%; supports complex multi-section forms with instant initialization
